description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P 500® Pure Value Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index includes securities that exhibit the strongest value characteristics as measured using three factors: book to value price ratio, earnings to price ratio, and sales to price ratio, as selected by the index provider strictly in accordance with its guidelines and mandated procedures. The fund is non-diversified.
